PlayerCareerStats.name: PlayerCareerStats
PlayerCareerStats.example_code:
# Get career stats for Nikola Jokić (ID: 203999)
from nba_api.stats.endpoints import playercareerstats
career = playercareerstats.PlayerCareerStats(player_id='203999')
career_df = career.get_data_frames()[0]

LeagueLeaders.name: LeagueLeaders
LeagueLeaders.example_code:
# Get current season's league leaders
from nba_api.stats.endpoints import leagueleaders
leaders = leagueleaders.LeagueLeaders()
leaders_df = leaders.get_data_frames()[0]

LeagueGameLog.name: LeagueGameLog
LeagueGameLog.example_code:
# Get game logs for the current season
from nba_api.stats.endpoints import leaguegamelog
game_log = leaguegamelog.LeagueGameLog()
games_df = game_log.get_data_frames()[0]
